name: Download a Brain
description:
If you've been sent here, probably somebody thinks you need a brain.

If you came here by yourself, statistically, you still probably need one.

This is probably the closest thing you can do for free: improve your working memory, get a healthy habit using this software every day, maybe start eating veggies and working out, read a book every week, and eventually you'll probably thank whoever sent you here.

Train your new Brain: try to remember the card before the one currently displayed...

Customizable: ... and then try to remember the card 2 cards ago, 3 cards ago, 4, 5, 6, and set the length of your game!

Credits: Andrea Rosini

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for Applied Sciences

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game A Week" (WinterSemester 2020/21)
